title: Land of the Unaccountability ( Tezlyn Figaro and the members of Geogre Floyd’s family)
itunes:title: Land of the Unaccountability ( Tezlyn Figaro and the members of Geogre Floyd’s family)
description:
Today on the show we had the hood whisperer Tezlyn Figaro and the members of George Floyd's family call in where they spoke about the relieving verdict of the Derick Chauvin Case, and afterwards we opened up the phone lines to hear what our listeners thought about the jury finding Derick Chauvin guilty. Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the Las Vegas Raiders for tweeting out an insensitive tweet relating to George Floyd, Also, during "Ask Yee", Charlamagne even tried helping a listener out who's friend stopped talking to him by trying to leave a voicemail, but didn't go as planned.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had the hood whisperer Tezlyn Figaro and the members of George Floyd's family call in where they spoke about the relieving verdict of the Derick Chauvin Case, and afterwards we opened up the phone lines to hear what our listeners thought about the jury finding Derick Chauvin guilty. Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the Las Vegas Raiders for tweeting out an insensitive tweet relating to George Floyd, Also, during "Ask Yee", Charlamagne even tried helping a listener out who's friend stopped talking to him by trying to leave a voicemail, but didn't go as planned.
